item.title: Adding Dragon Points [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

Iv added new points for when you kill a dragon so you can spend them in a shop but when you logout you lose the points, here are my player.java and playersave.java

player.java: DragonPoints =0,

playersave.java: } else if (token.equals(“DragonPoints”)) {
p.DragonPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("DragonPoints = ", 0, 12);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.DragonPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.DragonPoints).length()) characterfile.newLine();

Read full topic
